name: DataMatt
tag_list: computer, repair, technology, remote, windows, virus-removal, help, desktop, laptop, service, lincoln, missouri, outlook, crash, blue-screen, error, hard-drive
overview: We offer computer services of all types with our latest addition of remote repair. Whether you need something as simple as setting up an in-home network or as detailed as a small business network, we are here to get the job done quickly and efficiently with 100% reliability. With numerous clients all over the States, you can know your PC needs will be met. Computer Virus Removal, Spyware Removal, Software Installation, Computer/Printer Set Up, Home Entertainment Set Up, Computer Tutorials from the Home, and General PC Maintenance are just a few of the services we offer. With our Remote Access Capabilities, you can now have your computer repaired and never leave your home as we will access your PC from our location for your repairs.
